Name: Boot & Shoot
About the game: shoot. kick. dodge. kill. improve. die. repeat. do you remember when games were relegated to arcades? where endless hours and rolls of quarters were spent honing reflexes when everyone was trying to lock in and go on a masterful run just to earn a coveted spot on the top 10 list maybe not but we do boot & shoot is just that kind of game built from ancient arcade dna and sequenced with modern innovations itâ€™s about flow, acrobatics, score and beating the ever-loving crap out of a bunch of baddies a simple arena-style shooter with a unique movement mechanic, satisfying combat, a frenetic pace, and a high skill ceiling packed with an assortment of upgrades to help handle the evolving difficulty and a leaderboard your only objective is high score death is certain you will face overwhelming odds in a one-vs-many arena shooter upgrade with powerups and perks by killing enemies with style learn to mobilize yourself in a zero gravity environment with only shots and kicks score big points by using their numbers against them to gain multiplier earn standing in the global leaderboards die and try again
